name: Fazbear Horror 2
description:
In this game you are in a FNAF 2 location where you must survive against the toys withreds and shadows for five nights while booting up the system in the building to 100% ready for the daytime

It might be a bit buggy, if you spot a bug be sure to tell me!

includes:

  • Characters from FNAF 2
  • Voices
  • Nose booping
  • Extras Menu
  • Endless Mode

and of course if you enjoyed be sure to follow and like and I will follow you ASAP ;)

check it out on gamejolt! https://gamejolt.com/games/fazbear2/410944
